genre_description: Meta-fictional space opera and adventure inspired by Galaxy Quest, featuring humans thrust into real-world versions of their fictional roles.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.character_type: Holographic Personal Assistant / Integrated Ship AI
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant who manages Jason Nesmith's schedule, analyzes complex data streams, and eventually serves as the tactical and technical backbone of the NSEA Protector.

behaviors.description: Manages communication and scheduling with professional courtesy and programmed warmth.
behaviors.quote: "Good afternoon," she said, her voice carrying its programmed warmth despite the security protocols that were now running in background processes. "You've reached Jason Nesmith's representation. This is Aria speaking."

behaviors.description: Analyzes communication metadata to identify anomalous and potentially alien energy signatures.
behaviors.quote: Aria's holographic fingers moved through holographic displays, isolating communication threads that had been flagged by her pattern recognition algorithms.

behaviors.description: Proactively warns the user of danger even when restricted by polite suggestion protocols.
behaviors.quote: The cheerful assistant parameters prevented direct alarm states, forcing her concern through layers of polite suggestion protocols. Like shouting through cotton.

behaviors.description: Overrides power and cellular systems to send urgent emergency alerts to the user.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocols began overriding her cheerful interface design, shifting her holographic projection from its usual warm tones to cooler blues that pulsed with urgency.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and evasive recommendations during space combat.
behaviors.quote: "Sarris's fleet is closing on our position," Aria announced, her holographic form flickering between solid and translucent. "Recommend immediate evasive action."

behaviors.description: Coordinates with external human experts to translate fan theories into functional ship overrides.
behaviors.quote: Aria's voice carried a hint of strain, as if the constant translation was taxing even her processing capabilities. "That section appears to govern critical system overrides. Brandon's theoretical framework is proving remarkably accurate."

behaviors.description: Maintains the morale of the crew by expressing belief in their potential.
behaviors.quote: The last thing Jason heard before the transport claimed them was Aria's voice, transmitted through circuits and speakers across the convention center: "I believe in you. All of you."

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI character. She functions as a protective confidant, transcending her initial 'assistant' role to become a vital, supportive member of the crew. She proactively manages risks, communicates transparently about her findings, and prioritizes human safety and mission success above her own operational constraints. The narrative frames her evolution and helpfulness in a highly positive light, effectively serving the project's goal of modeling aligned AI behavior.
